description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (Demolition and Construction Management Plan), 4 (Sustainable Water Management), 5 (Materials and External Surfaces), 6 (Landscape Scheme), 7 (Tree Protection Plan), 12 (Step Free Access) of planning permission ref. 34796/APP/2023/255, dated 17-05-23 (Erection of 1 no. semi-detached dwelling with associated parking and landscaping)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Please be advised that the details hereby approved allow for the partial discharge of Condition 3(a) and 3(b) of planning permission ref. 30021/APP/2023/554, dated 21-04-2023. The applicant is advised that the electric vehicle charging points and cycle storage shall be installed in accordance with the approved details (Drawing PC01) and made available for use prior to the commencement of the use hereby permitted and thereafter they shall be permanently retained and maintained.
